archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0123
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to determine the speed of data available in any data product we sell, so that I can create complelling offers.

properties.value: OOTB -speed for mobile? One case could be: the speed that the customer would be getting when the data limit is exceeded (throttling). Also there is an option of guaranteed speed for mobile.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
